tool_description: No. 1 rated U.S listed stock and options data provider with the lowest cost. The cloud based API has a simple interface and return easy to consume data in JSON format for options prices.
name: Stock and Options Trading Data Provider
title: Stock and Options Trading Data Provider
tool_name: Stock and Options Trading Data Provider

api_list.name: Options

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: A ticker for U.S. Trading Stocks and ETF

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-and-options-trading-data-provider.p.rapidapi.com/options/aapl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-and-options-trading-data-provider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-and-options-trading-data-provider.p.rapidapi.com/options/{ticker}"

print(response.json())
